body: As shown below, I provided a list of two keywords to the **EPCustomResult** component to filter the result related to **Surface Outside Face Incident Solar Radiation Rate per Area** for **glazing** **surfaces** only. However, it seems this component only filtered the result by the 2nd keywords which include both glazing and non-glazing surfaces: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/PyPlrJLAwZfFEWDtFPug-3WYXup7cc1WnfghwL**Taf4J2DE4a6djtv5nLFv5T*nyMMHLswWWbGYclZ-8ABi62Je0U3eaVSO/Image1.png) May I ask how to filter the result file by multiple keywords, e.g. filter result by both **surface type** and **name of output variable**? Thanks.
topic: how to filter the result file by multiple keywords
